mapper.select: select c.chart_id ChartId, c.song_id SongId, s.song_title_cn SongTitleCn, s.song_title_en SongTitleEn, s.song_title_jp SongTitleJp, c.mode_id ModeId, m.mode_name ModeName, c.difficulty_id DifficultyId, d.difficulty_name DifficultyName, c.chart_level ChartLevel, c.chart_usable ChartUsable from mug_chart c left join mug_song s on c.song_id = s.song_id left join mug_mode m on c.mode_id = m.mode_id left join mug_difficulty d on c.difficulty_id = d.difficulty_id where s.game_id = #{gameId}
